articles.description: Céline Sciamma’s follow-up to Portrait of a Lady on Fire takes an 8-year-old girl back in time to hang out in her mother’s childhood and get to know her as a friend. Like Sciamma’s other work, it’s sensitive, emotional, and delicate. In theaters April 22.
